00033 void PCA::computePrincipleComponents(PointCloud3D* inputPointCloud, Eigen::MatrixXd& eigenvectors, Eigen::VectorXd& eigenvalues) {
00034 
00035         // Compute mean and covariance
00036         Eigen::Matrix3d covariance;
00037         Eigen::Vector3d centroid;
00038 
00039         centroid = centroidExtractor.computeCentroid(inputPointCloud);
00040 
00041         /*** compute covariance matrix  ***/
00042         covariance.setZero ();
00043         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00044                 Eigen::Vector4d pt;
00045                 pt[0] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - centroid[0];
00046                 pt[1] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - centroid[1];
00047                 pt[2] = (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() - centroid[2];
00048                 pt[3] = 1.0; //homogeneous point
00049 
00050                 covariance (1, 1) += pt.y () * pt.y (); //the non X parts
00051                 covariance (1, 2) += pt.y () * pt.z ();
00052                 covariance (2, 2) += pt.z () * pt.z ();
00053 
00054                 pt *= pt.x ();
00055                 covariance (0, 0) += pt.x (); //the X related parts
00056                 covariance (0, 1) += pt.y ();
00057                 covariance (0, 2) += pt.z ();
00058         }
00059 
00060         //copy upper triangle to lower triangle as it is symmetric
00061         covariance (1, 0) = covariance (0, 1);
00062         covariance (2, 0) = covariance (0, 2);
00063         covariance (2, 1) = covariance (1, 2);
00064 
00065         /* normalize  */
00066         covariance /= inputPointCloud->getSize();
00067 
00068         /* compute eigen vectors and values */
00069         Eigen::SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Eigen::Matrix3d> evd (covariance);
00070         eigenvalues = evd.eigenvalues().real (); //NOTE eigen values not ordered by absolute values!
00071         eigenvectors = evd.eigenvectors().real ();
00072 
00073         // sort to descending -> main component is first
00074         Eigen::VectorXd eigenvaluesTmp = eigenvalues;
00075         Eigen::MatrixXd eigenvectorsTmp = eigenvectors;
00076         for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00077                 eigenvalues[i] = eigenvaluesTmp[2-i];
00078                 eigenvectors.col (i) = eigenvectorsTmp.col(2-i);
00079         }
00080 
00081         LOG(DEBUG) << "eigenvalues " << eigenvalues;
00082         LOG(DEBUG) << "eigenvectors " << eigenvectors;
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 void PCA::computeRotationMatrix(Eigen::MatrixXd eigenvectors, Eigen::VectorXd eigenvalues, IHomogeneousMatrix44* resultRotation) {
00087         assert(resultRotation != 0);
00088 
00089         double* matrixData;
00090         matrixData = resultRotation->setRawData();
00091 
00092         /*
00093          * column-row layout:
00094          * 0 4 8  12
00095          * 1 5 9  13
00096          * 2 6 10 14
00097          * 3 7 11 15
00098          */
00099         /* rotation */
00100         matrixData[0] = eigenvectors(0,0);
00101         matrixData[4] = eigenvectors(0,1);
00102         matrixData[8] = eigenvectors(0,2);
00103         matrixData[1] = eigenvectors(1,0);
00104         matrixData[5] = eigenvectors(1,1);
00105         matrixData[9] = eigenvectors(1,2);
00106         matrixData[2] = eigenvectors(2,0);
00107         matrixData[6] = eigenvectors(2,1);
00108         matrixData[10] = eigenvectors(2,2);
00109 
00110         /* flip z axis (to make it compliant to the right hand rule for frames) */
00111         matrixData[8] = -matrixData[8];
00112         matrixData[9] = -matrixData[9];
00113         matrixData[10] = -matrixData[10];
00114 
00115         /* translation */
00116         matrixData[12] = 0.0;
00117         matrixData[13] = 0.0;
00118         matrixData[14] = 0.0;
00119 
00120         /* homogeneous coefficients */
00121         matrixData[3] = 0.0;
00122         matrixData[7] = 0.0;
00123         matrixData[11] = 0.0;
00124         matrixData[15] = 1.0;
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 }
